channel.title: When i run the client it gives me this error. HELP ME FIX PLEASE!
channel.description: [code]The system cannot find the path specified. java.net.UnknownHostException: pauls-world.no-ip.biz at java.net.Inet6AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method) at java.net.InetAddress$1.lookupAllHostAddr(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAddressesFromNameService(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName0(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getByName(Unknown Source) at Gui.<init>(Gui.java:32) at Gui.main(Gui.java:26)[/code]

item.title: When i run the client it gives me this error. HELP ME FIX PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @joyomama1 joyomama1
item.description:
@joyomama1 wrote:

sk8rdude461:

The host in Gui.java is invalid.

True thats what it saysâ€¦ but in dumber terms the ip you are using is invalid or not registered.
